nodes.bodyText: One of the need for acceptSession() API  was to show user that it can fail. if session does not get accepted they need to do something? Either go to next session or have some code to log message about it.
It'll propagate it downstream into the subscriber. So it'll be handled by the onError.
Both of these links are not working
